Passaic.Sandy Hill, Paterson: Sandy Hill is a neighborhood in Paterson, New Jersey It is located roughly west of Madison Avenue, north of Cedar Street, south of Market Street and east of Straight Street. Due to Paterson's significant population turn-over, this neighborhood is now home to a large Hispanic community, mostly first-generation Dominicans. The Sandy Hill section of Paterson is located in the city's 5th Ward.
